rewrite1: Begin by styling the first paragraph with an underlined effect using the 'Word Underline' feature. Then, adjust the paragraph's outline level to Level 2. Align the text to the right side of the page and choose 'Malgun Gothic' for the font. Set the right indentation to 2 centimeters and also alter the left indentation to be 2 centimeters as well.
rewrite2: Begin by updating the first paragraph with the following adjustments: underline the text using the 'word underline' style option. Then, alter the Outline Level to Level 2. Adjust the text alignment to be right-aligned. Choose 'Malgun Gothic' for the font style. Set the right indent to 2 centimeters and also change the left indent to match at 2 centimeters.
rewrite3: Begin by styling the initial paragraph with an underline in Word. Adjust the Outline Level to Level 2 for this section. Align the text to the right side of the page and choose 'Malgun Gothic' for the font. Set the right indentation at 2 centimeters and also alter the left indentation to match the 2 centimeter measurement.
